UniprotID	Q9H2M3
Accession	Q9H2M3;B7Z516;Q9NXX7
EntryName	BHMT2_HUMAN
ProteinName	S-methylmethionine--homocysteine S-methyltransferase BHMT2 (SMM-hcy methyltransferase) (EC 2.1.1.10) (Betaine--homocysteine S-methyltransferase 2)
GeneName	BHMT2
Length	363
Function	Involved in the regulation of homocysteine metabolism. Converts homocysteine to methionine using S-methylmethionine (SMM) as a methyl donor.
Subcellular Location
